sentence.Network_en: We were driven across this wondrous vast land of lakes and forests.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们乘车穿越这片有着湖泊及森林的广袤而神奇的土地。

sentence.Network_en: " Wondrous strength arid generosity of a woman's heart!
sentence.Network_cn: “ 一个女人的心胸是多么坚强和宽阔啊!
老天保佑这里的一切都是真的.

There are wondrous ways to handle energy that are natural , non - invasive and safe ., 有自然非侵入和安全处理能量的奇妙方式.

list.abs: 你领略了黄山的的奇松 （wondrous pines）/怪石（unique rocks）等美丽的风景。 Today I visited the Yellow Mountain.
...s）,奇松登山便可领略其云海（ 奇松 ）、怪石怪石（ （wondrous pines）、怪石（unique rocks） ） 等秀丽的风景及清晨美丽的 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: alteration of obsolete wonders (adjective and adverb), genitive of wonder, on the pattern of marvellous

entry.tran: 奇异的;美妙的;令人惊叹的
entry.def: If you describe something as wonderous, you mean it is strange and beautiful or impressive.

example.ex: We were driven across this wondrous vast land of lakes and forests.
example.tran: 我们乘车穿越这片有着湖泊及森林的广袤而神奇的土地。

means.word_mean: 1. extraordinarily good; used especially as intensifiers;

auth_sentence.content: But he delivers wondrous delights at a low price.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he delivers wondrous delights at a low price.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But he delivers wondrous delights at a low price.

auth_sentence.content: It was a startling experience wondrous in all ways.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was a startling experience wondrous in all ways.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was a startling experience wondrous in all ways.

auth_sentence.content: O'er Roslin...A wondrous blaze was seen to gleam.
